data.message: My Fb got hacked I had to make a new one because the email and # got changed on my old one I would like to get it back I'm disabled can't feel from the waste down the guy is using my Fb and telling all my friends about a grant as long as 200$ goes to FedEx with there address here's a pic of my old Fb I want it back it has all my memories and pictures on it please help

replies.message: Hi Crystal. If you think someone else has access to your account, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2pgy807. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure at: http://bit.ly/2pgjYvW. -Jon
I can't make a password cause they changed it
Its not the Facebook I'm on its my other one I can't get on I sent messages to you and never got a replay
Hi Crystal. Thanks for following up with us. To report an old account, or get help recovering it, please visit: http://bit.ly/2pgGVz3. -Jon
I don't have a desk top I'm a paraplegic so all I have is a phone read the messages I sent that would help and get my old Facebook which I can't get in back please
